name: VGR Hair Clipper Professional Hair Trimmer Electric Hair Cutting Machine Vector Motor Haircut 9000 RPM Clipper for Men V-015
shortDescription: Professional vector motor clipper with 9000 RPM for precise haircuts
description: The VGR V-015 Professional Hair Clipper features advanced vector motor technology delivering 9000 RPM of consistent cutting power. Designed for professional barbers and stylists, this electric hair cutting machine provides precision, reliability, and exceptional performance for all hair types. The ergonomic design ensures comfort during extended use.

name: VGR Hair Trimmers Professional Body Trimmer Vector Motor 10000RPM Hair Clippers Rechargeable Clippers Hair Trimmer for Men V-994
shortDescription: Professional vector motor trimmer with 10000RPM for body grooming
description: The VGR V-994 Professional Hair Trimmer combines powerful 10000RPM vector motor technology with versatile body grooming capabilities. Perfect for detailed hair trimming, body grooming, and precision work. This rechargeable trimmer offers professional-grade performance with exceptional runtime and multiple attachments for various grooming needs.
features: Multi-purpose trimmer for hair and body

specifications.accessories: 5 guide combs, cleaning brush, USB cable
